name: Slick Post
author: Anik Biswas

sections.description:
Slick Post is a simple plugins to show the post after scroll the page. Automatically show the post.

Major features in Slick Post include:

  • Automatically Show the page in four position top left, top right, bottom left and bottom right.
  • You can select this for custom post type.
  • You can select the category of the post.
  • Dark theme and light theme is included.
  • Increase the user engaged to your site.
  • For pomotional post you can use this.
  • Increase the visitor to your blog.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/slick-post directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin
  4. Check The Setting from the Settings->Slick Post

1, 2, 3: You’re done!
sections.faq:
Is it always show the latest post?

Yes it is always whow the latest post. But for single page it show the post without current page post.

What about custom post type?

Yes it show custom posttype and category
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • A change since the previous version.

1.1

  • Fix All Bug
  • Add New Option
  • Design Changed

short_description: Slick Post show the recent post after scroll and show the recent post.
